findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Add the `constant` attributes to state variables that never change

findings.title: Unused return values
findings.description: Ensure that all the return values of the function calls are used and handle both success and failure cases if needed by the business logic

findings.title: New DividendTracker settings
findings.description: New dividend tracker is not excluded from fee, max wallet limit, and max transaction amount

findings.title: Unnecessary code
findings.description: There are instances of commented out code in files that should be removed.
